knxUltimateHueTapDial.title: Hue Tap Dial node (rotary)
knxUltimateHueTapDial.mapping_info: Link the Hue Tap Dial rotation events to a KNX group address.
knxUltimateHueTapDial.behaviour_info: Decide whether the Node-RED output pin should remain visible when KNX delivery is disabled.
knxUltimateHueTapDial.output_info: Without a KNX gateway the flow output stays enabled so Hue events continue to reach Node-RED.
knxUltimateHueTapDial.no_devices: No Hue Tap Dial devices found. Use the refresh icon after pairing a new dial.
